meanings.sent1: The nonreceipt of the package was disappointing.
meanings.sent2: She filed a complaint about the nonreceipt of her order.
meanings.sent3: The nonreceipt of the invitation meant she missed the party.
meanings.sent4: His nonreceipt of the email left him out of the loop.
meanings.sent5: The nonreceipt of the prize was a letdown for the winner.

meanings.definition: The state of not having received something.
meanings.sent1: The nonreceipt of the letter caused confusion.
meanings.sent2: They investigated the nonreceipt of the payment.
meanings.sent3: The nonreceipt of the message led to a misunderstanding.
meanings.sent4: Her nonreceipt of the gift made her feel forgotten.
meanings.sent5: The nonreceipt of the report delayed the project.
